snippet.title: Tiny & Big: Grandpa's Leftovers Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Hooray fellow indies,

We're so happy to announce our first official game release (June 19th). Tiny & Big: Grandpa's Leftovers is available on all the platforms below. We wish you a lot of fun by slicing the world and listening awesome indie tunes.

Cheers to all our friends out there and all the people who supported us on our path.
*bow low*


You can support us directly via the Humble Store Widget on our website:
https://goo.gl/YqCv8b

Get STEAM advantages:
https://goo.gl/6rG1yx

You prefer the GOG DRM free version:
https://goo.gl/9AKevH


Soundtrack:
Bandcamp: https://goo.gl/yi83RQ


Musik by Man and Birdmen with Giallos Flame:
MySpace: https://goo.gl/f45ZKA
